title: NBA NFL STREET HD REMATSERED COLLECTION for PC (4 Games!)
description:
This is a preconfigured install for NBA Street 1, 2 and 3, plus NFL Street 2 with upscaled HD textures, SweetFX, Reshade, and much more.  The various features require very specific emulator versions, settings and plug ins. It can be very complicated to get everything working so I have decided to pack it all up in a release.

4 full games included:
NBA Street
NBA Street 2
NBA Street 3
NFL Street 2

These are some of the greatest arcade style sports games ever made, and now better than ever!


Just install and run the game exe file just like any other PC game.  The emulator, and all game specific settings have all been wrapped in the games exe and install for easy install and use.



Configured to use a standard PC controller (xbox360, etc)
